#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int sum_digits(unsigned long number);
int main()
{           int test_cases;
            cin>>test_cases;
                while(test_cases--)
                { int num;
                cin>>num;

                int sum=sum_digits(num);
                int result=num*(pow(2,sum));
                cout<<result<<"\n";
                }
                return 0;
 }
int sum_digits(unsigned long number)
{ int sum=0;
while(number>0)
{ sum=sum+(number%10);
number=number/10;
}
return sum;
}
